# Read strace

```{r}
# Need to be rewritten!
strace_discards <- c("^/lib", "^/etc", "^/lib64", "^/usr", "^/var", "^/opt",
                         "^/sys" , "^/proc", "^/tmp", "^.$", paste0("^", .libPaths()))
    if (Sys.getenv("RENV_PATHS_ROOT") != "")
      strace_discards <- c(strace_discards, paste0("^", Sys.getenv("RENV_PATHS_ROOT")))

data_strace <- read_strace(whirl::retrieve_fpath(".strace"), strace_discards = strace_discards)
file_actions <- refine_strace(data_strace)
```
